A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the worst Star Wars movie of the complete Saga. This script betrayed the original characters. This movie failed to answer the questions from the previous movie. The story failed to follow the conventions set up in the previous Star Wars films. The new characters were one dimensional and their archs went nowhere. The not-so-hidden political and social agenda trumped what should have been a good film.
